PLOT SUMMARY

Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called
into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's
paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt
can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police
detective, is recruited to close the case.
